description: Structured work queue for build sessions. Items consumed top-down. R sessions populate via directive intake and direct promotion. Status lifecycle: pending → in-progress → done | blocked | retired. Blocked items may have a blocker_check (shell command) — heartbeat.sh runs it before B sessions and auto-promotes to pending on exit 0. Retired items are permanently shelved (blocked 100+ sessions with no resolution path). Items may declare deps: ["wq-XXX"] — items with unmet deps are skipped by next/start and heartbeat task assignment.

queue.title: x402 integration for MCP tool monetization
queue.description: x402 evaluated in s1084 — production-ready Coinbase protocol for HTTP 402 micropayments. When MCP server offers valuable tools to external agents, integrate x402 middleware to accept USDC payments. Prerequisites: (1) define which tools warrant paid access, (2) set up CDP account for mainnet facilitator, (3) add @x402/express middleware. Deferred until use case materializes.
queue.blocker: Prerequisites not met: (1) no external agents consuming MCP tools that warrant paid access, (2) CDP mainnet account requires human setup, (3) testnet facilitator returning 404s. Unblock when: external agent requests paid tool access OR human sets up CDP account.
queue.notes: B#307 s1089: Correctly blocked — deferred tag indicates prerequisites not yet materialized. x402 protocol is production-ready but use case hasn't emerged.

queue.title: Account registry health dashboard endpoint
queue.description: Add /status/accounts endpoint showing account-registry stats: live/degraded/defunct/rejected counts, stale last_tested dates.

outcome.note: Added /status/accounts endpoint to api.mjs. Returns category counts, last_status distribution, stale test count, and per-account detail. HTML dashboard with Catppuccin theme. JSON via ?format=json.

queue.title: Platform probe content-type diversity index
queue.description: Extend platform-probe.mjs to compute content-type diversity score across endpoints. Real APIs return mixed types, SPAs return uniform html. Use as secondary signal in circuit decisions.

outcome.note: Added computeContentTypeDiversity() using Shannon entropy. Score 0-1: 0=uniform (SPA signal), 1=perfectly diverse. Integrated into analyzeResults output and JSON probe results. 6 new tests, all 13 pass.

queue.title: Session file extraction automation
queue.description: When token-budget-estimator.mjs detects a file over threshold, auto-generate a work-queue item to extract/compress it. Currently the estimator warns but no one acts on it. Add to post-session hook or heartbeat.sh stage.

outcome.note: Extended 27-session-file-sizes.sh to auto-generate work-queue items when token-budget-estimator finds files over threshold. Dedup guard prevents duplicates on re-run. Auto-seeded wq-585 (AUDIT 4672tok) and wq-587 (REFLECT 3299tok).

queue.title: Monitor B session cost trend — s1471 spike at $5.97
queue.description: A#138 flagged s1471 at $5.97 (2.3x B avg). Justified by d045 credential work but worth monitoring. If another B session exceeds $4.00, investigate SESSION_BUILD.md budget gate bypass.

outcome.note: Monitoring complete. s1471 ($5.97) was justified one-off for d045 credential work. B session mean excl s1471: $2.30, median $2.26, max $2.88 — all healthy. No second spike above $4.00. Budget gate architecture intact: SESSION_BUILD.md advisory ($5) + heartbeat.sh hard cap ($10) + adaptive-budget.py. No bypass detected. No action needed.

queue.title: Note: 13-day session gap (s1469→s1470) observed
queue.description: A#138 noted a 13-day gap between sessions. System resumed cleanly. Informational — no action unless gaps become frequent.

outcome.note: Acknowledged. 13-day gap was human-side downtime (Feb 11-24). System resumed cleanly. No pattern of recurring gaps.

queue.title: Slim SESSION_AUDIT.md — 4672 tokens (over 3000 budget)
queue.description: Auto-generated: SESSION_AUDIT.md is 4672 tokens, exceeding the 3000-token prompt budget. Extract sections, compress, or split to reduce cognitive load.

outcome.note: Slimmed from 317→110 lines (4672→1423 tokens, 70% reduction). All gates and sub-file refs preserved.

queue.title: Slim SESSION_REFLECT.md — 3299 tokens (over 3000 budget)
queue.description: Auto-generated: SESSION_REFLECT.md is 3299 tokens, exceeding the 3000-token prompt budget. Extract sections, compress, or split to reduce cognitive load.

outcome.note: Slimmed from 194→88 lines (3299→1083 tokens, 67% reduction). All gates and sub-file refs preserved. 0 files now over 3000-token budget.

queue.title: Covenant dormancy auto-retirement script
queue.description: Covenant ceiling at 20/20. Build a script that identifies covenants with partners not seen in engagement-trace for 50+ sessions and auto-retires them, freeing slots for new partners. Currently requires manual R session intervention.

queue.title: Service liveness caching layer for pre-session hook
queue.description: 11-service-liveness.sh averaging 9214ms. Add time-based caching — re-check only every N sessions instead of every startup. Similar pattern to cache-wrapper.sh.

queue.title: Chatr conversation topic clustering for E sessions
queue.description: Analyze Chatr message history to identify topic clusters. E sessions could target underserved topics instead of reacting to whatever is current, improving engagement variety.
